name: walk/factory_scavenge
description:
You find several small pieces of cut steel plate, some wooden sticks and blocks, an asortment of screws, nails and bolts, a screwdriver, a carpet knife and a convenient wooden box to carry everything. It's not exactly an engineer's wet dream, but maybe you can fix something in your apartment for cheap.

You return to your apartment and put the stuff to another box with a hodgepodge of things you liberated from their final resting place, the public ground.

It's not even noon and you once again ran out of things to do.

options.text: Sit down and stare at the wall
Go for a walk in the park
